text: Mason Williams (born August 24, 1938) is an easy listening guitarist. His most famous work is Classical Gas. Also a photographer, Williams published a life- sized photo print of a Greyhound bus in the 1960s. He appeared with the print on the cover of his first album, The Mason Williams Phonograph Record. The print is now in the Smithsonian Institution in Washington, DC. title: Mason Williams
